item.title: Project 2: Analysis of Armory in CS:GO
item.description: *AIM : To find the best features in CS:Go data that can predict win accurately. *Idea : One question people always ask to win a team is “Tell us about the winning recipe?”. Is there a secret ingredient? .It’s all started with one simple question. How small decisions players make during a game will have an impact on a game. For example, this idea we will analyze the armory. How small decision like buying a weapon in a particular round has an impact on match or not.
